title: [Large-Scale] Learning Analytics-Based Elementary Social Studies Curriculum Design Strategies

context.additional_context: Utilizes a smartphone-based Learning Management System (LMS), with two weekly face-to-face sessions (2 hours each) + asynchronous online activities.

learning_goals: Interpret learning analytics data and utilize it to improve instructional design.
Identify at least three learning patterns of students through formative assessments.
Improve the standard achievement rate of courses by 15% based on normative analysis results.

Learners will visualize at least three sets of public data using bar/pie charts via Google Data Studio or Tableau Mobile apps on smartphones during a 4-week mid-term course, save the generated charts as PDFs, and submit them.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
